remarks: Define the class of N-manifold topologies, as 2nd countable, Hausdorff topologies, locally homeomorphic to a ball of the Euclidean space of dimension N. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Dec-2019.)
statement:
df-mntop $p |- ManTop = { <. n , j >. | ( n e. NN0 /\ ( j e. 2ndc /\ j e. Haus /\ j e. Locally [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` n ) ) ] ~= ) ) } $.
$d j n $.
